protocol: Initiate basic life support. Ensure airway is clear, begin rescue breathing, and alert advanced medical responders.
Place patient in recovery position, monitor closely, and check for injuries. Alert medical responders.
Apply direct pressure, elevate limb (if applicable), and use a tourniquet if bleeding does not stop. Seek immediate medical assistance.
Keep the patient seated, reassure, monitor vital signs; administer aspirin if not allergic, and prepare for possible cardiac intervention.
Cool the burn under running water for at least 10 minutes, cover with a sterile non-adhesive bandage, and avoid breaking blisters. Refer for further care.
